entry.title: Google Play Store (Game) - QuickShot

div.p: Claim it now for free on Google Play Store.
About the game (Quickshot*):

ul.li: Description: The makers of The Tower send you to the Quickshot boot camp to give you a fighting chance in the war against the machines. Use pistols, shotguns, lasers, submachine guns and chain guns to take down targets launched at you and avoid obstacles to not get smashed. Open fire in slow motion and get in cover when getting shot at or wield a weapon from more civilized days.

div.p: * Any information about the offer is automatically grabbed and may in rare cases not match the correct game.

entry.title: Google Play Store (Game) - Ice Breaker

div.p: Claim it now for free on Google Play Store.
About the game (Ice Breaker*):

ul.li: Description: Ice Breaker is a physics-puzzle game released January 4, 2009, and is the first installment of the Ice Breaker series. The player must use the mouse to cut ice and objects to get the vikings to their longboat. This game, along with twelve other games, was made a distributable game on August 25th, 2011, and was one of the first distributable games.

entry.title: Google Play Store (Game) - Rogue Hearts

div.p: Claim it now for free on Google Play Store.
About the game (Rogue Hearts*):

ul.li:
Description: Welcome to this modern reinterpretation of a rogue-like dungeon crawler! You will need a strategy with self-judgment and control, a necessity in SRPG and tactical games. Break through challenges and trials by controlling the character directly.
! Network connection required.
*Explore dungeons, and discover an unwanted and dark reality. *Explore regions with diverse themes and randomly generated dungeons with optimized, intuitive, and easy-to-use mobile device controls. *Fight boss monsters with deadly attack patterns and earn loot. *Engage in these ordeals by using characters with close combat and long distance skills. *Not only battles, but various traps and puzzles also lie in wait."

div.p: * Any information about the offer is automatically grabbed and may in rare cases not match the correct game.
